description: Relating to Planning Permission of 16/13151/FUL and 16/13152/LBC, Condition 3 (Temporary Period), proposed extension of time to provide temporary permission for the use of the Old Post Office as a Sales and Marketing Suite (Sui Generis) for an extended period up to 28th February 2024, which will align with the temporary consent for associated sales and marketing suite signage of planning permission
